examples: I tried to cheer her up, but failed miserably.
The show didn't just fail, it failed spectacularly.
The song can't fail to be a hit
an enterprise that was doomed to fail from the start
Doctors are failing in their duty if they do not warn their patients of the dangers.

meanings.meaning: fail to do sth: not do sth

examples: The authorities have totally failed to address this problem.
